boardgame.name: Star Fleet Battles: Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Basic Set
boardgame.description: The lead product of Star Fleet Battles Captain's Edition. This is the fourth edition in the Star Fleet Battles series, and it is the current edition._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There have been two major reprintings of the rules, each of which incorporates some errata and cleanup in the rules in 1999 and 2005. These can be identified by a year printed on the lower part of the front cover._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Star Fleet Battles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Star Fleet Battles Designer's Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Star Fleet Battles Commander's Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: 1993 revision. CONDITION: This copy is in good condition overall. The box is in good condition with one split corner, moderate shelf wear and creasing. The contents are in very good condition, with only 2 of 200 counters punched, apart from the rulebook and SSD book, the covers of which have got quite grubby, although they are otherwise lightly used. This game is guaranteed 100% Complete - personally verified! POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £5.50 European Postage: £9.00 Rest of World Postage: £17.50 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £39 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.
Uk 1st Class £4.60 Europe £7.40
Shipping Germany 4 Euro Shipping European Union 6 Euro Shipping World 12 Euro PayPal plus 1 Euro Money transfer via IBAN/BIC preferred

Amarillo Design Bureau (ADB 5501) First product in the SFB game system. Command a starship! What you saw on the screen, you can do for yourself. Basic Set is the core of the Star Fleet Battles (SFB) game system. Includes Federation, Klingon, Romulan, Kzinti, Gorn, Tholian, and Orion. Note: This boxed game includes the updated 2005 rulebook.
Comes with Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Yeoman Module A (new)

Having a 2ND Baby Auction... I need space and money... J Fro is the winner for $40. Thank you. Star Fleet Battles LOT. This is a large lot of star fleet battles base game plus expansions. This game has been played. Rules books are intact, most of the SSD_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s have been leaf removed, and are in folders. as best I can tell, all counters are accounted for, sorted by race in plastic compartmentalized trays. Captains Edition Advanced Missions A - Captains Yeoman C1 - New Worlds 1 C2 - New worlds 2 C3 - New worlds 3 C4 - Fleet Training Center R1 - Bases _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Aux R2 - Reinforcements 1 R3 - Reinforcements 2 R4 - Reinforcements 3 R6 - Fast Warships R7 - Dreadnaughts at War R10 - New Cruisers D3 - Booms and Saucers F - Jinarians J - Fighters K - Fast patrol Ships M - Marines S1 - Scenerio Book 1 S2 - Scenerio book 2 T - Tournament Ships X1 - X-ships Y1 - The early years you also get F_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;E - Federation and Empire base game Starting BID: $20 Soft Reserve: $50 BIN: $100 J Fro has opted to use his Fedex account to ship the item to himself.

1999 Edition. Never used, brand new, perfect condition. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $12.35 for USPS Priority Mail with delivery confirmation (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$5.00 (for the box and hassle, sorry, it is much more effort on my end). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.

Amarillo Design Bureau (ADB5501) First product in the SFB game system. Command a starship! What you saw on the screen, you can do for yourself. Basic Set is the core of the Star Fleet Battles (SFB) game system. Includes Federation, Klingon, Romulan, Kzinti, Gorn, Tholian, and Orion. Note: This boxed game includes the updated 2005 rulebook.

New and unplayed. I will only charge the actual USPS shipping price (lowest possible) with delivery confirmation for the game. Feel free to browse through my other games for sale in the marketplace. I will provide free shipping in the continental US for orders over $150. I will also offer $10 off on shipping to anywhere else in the world for orders over $150.

Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Basic Edition plus the following expansions: Module c1 New Worlds Module c2 New Worlds Module c3 New Worlds Module c4 Fleet Training Center Module J Fighters Module R5 Battleships Module R6 Fast Warships Module X1 First Generation X-ships

Collection of Star Fleet Battles boxed sets, modules and books: Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Basic Set (1999) Very Good - counters punched and clipped Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Advanced Missions (1999) Very Good - counters punched and clipped Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Module A+: Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Yeoman (2003) Like New - counters unpunched _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; card attached Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Module C1: New Worlds I (1994) Very Good - counters punched and clipped Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Module C2: New Worlds II (1994) Very Good - counters punched and clipped Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Module J: Fighters (1996) Very Good - counters unpunched but cover MIA Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Module S1: Scenario Book #1 (1992) Like New - clean cover and pages Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Module S2: Scenario Book #2 (1994) Like New - clean cover and pages Tactics Manual (1987) Acceptable - shelf wear on cover/back _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; binding
This item is for Sven Berglowe, won via 3 Star Trek Games mini-Auction.
SFB Mega-lot. Purchase set up for the OCBG 2014 Clear The Shelves Auction. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not the winning bidder, please do not purchase this item.

Game is complete and all components are in very good condition. Counter sheets 95% unpunched. Box shows minor shelf wear. The lead product of Star Fleet Battles Captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition. This is the fourth edition in the Star Fleet Battles series, and it is the current edition. This is the 1990 printing. Shipping will be added if items are not picked up locally. Shipping is through USPS from zip code 22306, or as otherwise arranged with buyer. Thanks for looking!
All the components are like new. The game has never been played, the chits are still unpunched and the booklets and paperwork are all in mint condition. The box shows minor shelf wear.
Reserved for user sfrazer from the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Gen Con Pickup Auction 2015 - A real hodge-podge of games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;
